name: Hamlet - The text adventure
description:
You're the prince of Denmark, and boy, are you in a sucky mood! You've been grounded again, your friends don't understand you, and your evil uncle has murdered your father to usurp the throne.

Experience Shakespeare's greatest tragedy as the Elizabethans themselves did, on their primitive 286-based PCs.

(You can play the game online, or download it as a zipfile if you would like to be able to play it offline - unzip the file into a fresh folder and open index.html.)

"In just five minutes' playing, I was hooked" – Neil Gaiman

"Superb" – Guardian

"While the idea is good, the execution lacks some of Shakespeare's poetry" – Scotsman

"Oh my goodness" – Ryan North 

"Well-executed, extremely funny" – Cory Doctorow

"Mildly amusing" - Channel 4
